ygData.subject: Re: Clothing
ygData.msgSnippet: That s OK.  I found what I was looking for...The Queynos robes are neon bluish actually.  It was a long hard struggle to get across the continent last
ygData.messageBody:
That's OK. I found what I was looking for...The Queynos robes are
neon bluish actually. It was a long hard struggle to get across the
continent last night...but there it was.

-- LimDul


>From: "Rick & Margi Ulrich" <ulrich1@...>

somewhere

>>

with.

>>
>> --LimDul
>> High Elf Wiz 11th
>> Veeshan
